about_the_game:
Puppet House is a puzzle-adventure horror game with escape room themes. Take on the role of detective Rick, investigating a series of mysterious disappearances of local residents. All the clues lead to an abandoned ventriloquist's house, full of dark secrets and terrifying surprises.

When the peaceful town of Field Town begins receiving reports of mysterious disappearances, Rick decides to investigate. Things quickly turn to worse, when the detective stumbles upon a horrifying surprise left by the late ventriloquist.

Come and face a demonic puppet that was born through a strange ritual and is now killing anyone who tries to enter the mansion...Will you be able to uncover all the secrets before the evil force gets you?

If you dare, try to beat…

PUPPET FROM HELL

As a result of a freak ritual, the old puppet comes to life and turns into a demonic killer. This paranormal force is hunting down anyone who dares to enter the mansion. What is it trying to hide? Are we sure that all the missing people are dead? Enter a dark house and see if you can carry out a…

DANGEROUS INVESTIGATION

Solve the puzzles hidden in the home of ventriloquist Peter Hill to uncover the truth. Take on challenges that require you to be not only clever but also logical. Your mind will be put to the test and any wrong decision could have dire consequences. Many mysteries are hidden in this…

FORGOTTEN MANSION

Wander through dark corridors where the shadows of the past intertwine with the present and feel like you're in a real escape room. Look carefully as old memorabilia hide the keys to the mysterious history of the house and its owner. Explore the abandoned grounds and find the answers you’re looking for.



Puppet House is thick with the atmosphere of tension and fear, heightened by the evocative visuals and sound design. The game skillfully builds a mood of dread that makes every step in the mansion a struggle for survival.

short_description: Puppet House is a puzzle-adventure horror with escape room elements. A freak ritual creates a killer puppet, murdering anyone who enters the ventriloquist’s mansion. Detective Rick, seeking missing locals, will soon face his greatest horror.
